SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.am52
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am52.model.game

Class Phase

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am52.model.game.Phase
Direct Known Subclasses:
DrawingPhase, EndingPhase, InitPhase, PlacingPhase
public abstract class Phase extends Object
The interface that simulate all the possible phases of a game. This interface will be used by different "concrete" classes, which will simulate a Finite State Machine, with this possible configuration:

(INIT-->PLACING, PLACING-->DRAWING, DRAWING-->PLACING, DRAWING-->END)

The idea at the base is very simple: in each state, the game will provide a different response, throwing an exception if * a method is called in a wrong part of the game; when we will call a method, first we will call the state saved in the class * GameManager on the corresponding action the user wants to play, then, when the State says that everything is matching, GameManager * will continue its computing, and finally it will call the method "next" to switch to the next possible state.

IMPORTANT: In the DRAWING phase, we have two different possible ways: returning in the PLACING phase or entering the END phase and calculating the winner/winners. So, GameManager will do the check on ScoreBoard and will call the method "endGame", and the state will be switched to END.

Other things handled by the Phase are the turn and the currentPlayer.

    • setPlayerChosenObject

      public void setPlayerChosenObject(GameManager manager, PlayerSetup player, int objectiveId)
      Set the objective card of a player. This method can only be executed during the InitPhase; in the other phases, this will throw a new exception.
      Parameters:
      player - The player who chose
      objectiveId - The ID of the card

    • placeStarterCard

      public void placeStarterCard(GameManager manager, PlayerBoardSetup player, StarterCard card, CardSide side)
      Place the starter card of a player This method can only be executed during the InitPhase; in the other phases, this will throw a new exception.
      Parameters:
      player - The slot of the board where the player places his card
      card - The card to place
      side - The face of the card

    • getWinners

      public List<String> getWinners(GameManager manager, List<PlayerInfo> players, List<Objective> commonObjectives)
      This method can only be executed during the InitPhase; in the other phases, this will throw a new exception.
      Parameters:
      players - The list of the players in the lobby
      commonObjectives - The common objective of the game
      Returns:
      The list with one or more winners, in case of a tie.
